materialSearchInput.placeholder: Enter the name of an item...

error.title: Something went wrong.
error.message: Our team have been alerted and we’ll be patching the issue up as soon as possible.

title.default: Sorry, we couldn’t find that location.
title.notInTheUK: Sorry, this service isn’t available in your area.

notFound.ukOnly: The data in this tool only covers mainland regions of the UK.
notFound.label: Try another location?

aside.content: Recycling information is available elsewhere for these UK regions:

about.title: About this service
about.intro: Powered by RecycleNow.com, this tool can be used to search and find recycling locations throughout the United Kingdom.

becomeAPartner.title: Add this tool to your website
becomeAPartner.description: It’s been created as an embeddable widget that can be added to any website to help visitors discover more recycling options. For example, a beverage manufacturer could use the tool to show places to recycle drinks cans.

feedback.title: Improving this service
feedback.description: We’re always looking to improve this tool and would be interested to hear about your experience whilst using it, good or bad.

list: see your nearest places to recycle

postcode.title: What do you need to recycle?

noSchemes.title: This item cannot be recycled at home
noSchemes.content: Check what you can put in your home recycling bins and if you have a food and garden waste collection.

manySchemes.title: Recycle at home

manySchemes.collectionAll: This item is collected from <bold>all properties</bold> in the area.

oneScheme.title: Recycle at home
oneScheme.collection: This item is collected in these containers:

notFound.label: Search again
notFound.help: Try using an alternative name for it, or search for a similar item or material.
